UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: The ascaphins: a family of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the most primitive extant frog, Ascaphus truei.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Sonnevend A, Davidson C, Smith DD, Nielsen PF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=50µM),Enterobacter cloacae NHTCC 53001(MIC=13µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KK3 9904(MIC=25µM),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 25933(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325(MIC=50µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A(MIC=25µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µM),Streptococcus group B HNTCC 80130(MIC=13µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=100µM)
